FuncDef: This command is used to configure the multiplication factor applied to the receive time used to clear the CSF condition.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the multiplication factor applied to the receive time that is used to clear the CSF condition. This value can only be configured in increments of 0.5. Configuring a value of 0.0 means that the CSF condition will be cleared only when C-DCI is received. Values-0.0, 2.0 to.30.0. ParamDefault: Default- 3.5
